main.formDescription:
Welcome to the menu request form. Please fill out the following fields to request a new menu.
Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required, and the form will not submit if they are left blank.
The most important part of the form is the menu composition, by clicking on the 'Add' button you can add as many menu items as you want, each with its description. The menu items can be reordered by dragging and dropping them.
